replies.body:
You contradicted yourself, I'm asking why you did it. :P

contradict
kɒntrəˈdɪkt/
verb
  1. deny the truth of (a statement) by asserting the opposite.
    "the survey appears to contradict the industry's claims"
    synonyms:deny, refute, rebut, dispute, counter; More

replies.body: How does it feel joining the jr mod army?

replies.body: Omg, it is so cool. I didn't even realize that being staff member can be so cool. Thanks for asking? How do you feel in staff team?

replies.body:
I like it so far, getting to just kick team griefers and get rid of them.

but srsly though taking reports is like a race, report comes in-multiple peeps try and claim it :O

but welcome to the jr mod army

replies.body:
1. I live in Celje in Slovenia
2.My name is Tomi (Call me Tom)
3.Can't decide between pasta and pizza :D
4. Dogs
5. Red
6. Coca-Cola
7. Luar
8. I was searching up for cool servers and I gave chance to Avicus. 
9. It is fantastic. I'm happy that I passed the interview and can help other players now.
